name: World Of Remmant
description:
In the World of Remmant, where magic was common and terrible monsters threatened all life, there were five glorious kingdoms inhabited by different peoples: Funji, Celestia, Rüstung, Viridi and Hominum.

Thousands of years ago, the so-called "Archimages" were largely responsible for ensuring the peace and unity of the five kingdoms, and this tradition continues to this day.

Discover the vast magical World of Remmant through Lilly's eyes, a young gnome from the kingdom of Funji who has her life drastically changed by a burden she has tried her best to avoid since she was a little girl.

_______________________________________

CONTROLS:

A and D --> Movement

H --> Jump

G --> Attack

F --> Use Poison
